title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
short_cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Aditya Roy Kapur, Kalki Koechlin, Kunaal Roy Kapur, Farooq Shaikh, Poorna Jagannathan, Naveen Kaushik, Evelyn Sharma, Madhuri Dixit

desc: On a trekking trip, an introvert falls for a charming ex-classmate, whose thirst for adventure drives them apart. Years later, their paths cross again.
